item.title: Course Schedule
item.description: Lecture schedule Week 1 Course outline Lesson 1: Introduction to regression slides-1 Week 2 Lesson 2: Simple linear regression slides-2 Lesson 3: Simple linear regression slides-3 Week 3 Lesson 4: Interpretation of Regression Outputs slides-4 Tutorial 1: click here Install R and RStudio Week 4 Simple Linear Regression Analysis with R Introduction to R and Rstudio Simple linear regression with R: R script Week 5 Multiple Linear Regression Analysis Slides
